name: Build
description: The AWS::GameLift::Build resource creates a build that includes all of the components to run your game server in an Amazon GameLift (GameLift) fleet.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: An identifier to associate with this build. Build names don't need to be unique.

properties.name: StorageLocation
properties.description: The Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) location where your build package files are located.

properties.name: Version
properties.description: A version to associate with this build. Version is useful if you want to track updates to your build package files. Versions don't need to be unique.
